settings.title: Settings
settings.claudeDescription: Display Claude Code status as badges on the tab bar and send desktop notifications. Add the following hooks settings.
settings.notificationDescription: Show notification when Claude Code generation completes
settings.notificationNote: Not shown when the editor is in the foreground (you can check the badge on the tab bar).
settings.autostartDescription: Automatically launch the app when your PC starts
settings.showBranchDescription: Display Git branch name on tabs

accessibility.title: Accessibility Permission Required
accessibility.description: Editor Tab Manager needs macOS accessibility permission to detect and manage editor windows. Please grant permission in System Settings.
accessibility.instructions: Settings → Privacy & Security → Accessibility → Enable Editor Tab Manager

onboarding.welcomeDescription: A desktop app that lets you manage multiple editor windows like browser tabs. Quickly switch between VSCode, Cursor, Zed, and more.
